name: ChatGPT
blurb: A chat application using OpenAI's GPT LLM.
description: An online chat application utilizing OpenAI's GPT large language model (LLM) to understand user inputs and generate outputs.

name: DALL-E
blurb: An image generation application by OpenAI.
description: An image generation application by OpenAI.

name: Research Rabbit
blurb: Uses AI to suggest papers to researchers.
description: ResearchRabbit is an innovative “citation-based literature mapping tool” available online. The scope of such a tool is to optimize your time searching for references as you start planning your essay, minor project, or literature review.

name: Elicit
blurb: Uses AI to gather insights from research literature
description: Elicit is an AI research assistant that helps you gather insights from across the research literature. It uses language models to help you automate research workflows, like parts of literature review.

name: Scholarcy
description: Scholarcy is an online article summarizer tool that reads your research articles, reports and book chapters in seconds and breaks them down into bite-sized sections.

name: Quillbot
blurb: AI-powered writing platform that helps with the drafting process and elevates your writing
description: Quillbot is an AI-powered tool which brings a paraphraser, grammar checker, summarizer, citation generator, co-writer, and plagiarism checker to assist you in writing.

name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that can help users with a variety of tasks, including brainstorming, revision, and citations.

name: ChatPDF
description: ChatPDF is an AI-powered tool which analyzes a given PDF and answers any questions the user has about the pdf using ChatGPT

name: AskYourPDF
description: AskYourPDF is an innovative platform that leverages the power of GPT-4 to seamlessly transform any PDF into responsive and intelligent conversational partners.

name: Revision.ai
description: Revision.ai is an adapts to your lectures and shows you the best flashcards to increase your memory

name: Speechify
description: Speechify is an AI text-to-speech reader that can power through docs, articles, PDFs, email, and anything you read by listening with their leading AI text-to-speech reader

name: Otter.ai
description: Otter.ai is an AI tool for real-time audio transcription.

name: PDF.ai
description: PDF.ai uses GPT-3.5 to analyze documents and then respond to any questions the user has about the document.

name: Notion AI
blurb: AI-powered tool which helps you take notes and revise your writing
description: Notion AI gives users tools to help them improve their writing and to take notes using AI.
